Loved by the locals, this tiny tapas bar is outstanding.  The tapas are homemade and although the service can get slow depending on the time of day (it can get pretty busy and I believe it's family run), its worth the visit.  The coolest part of this pub is the adjoining wine store to its left.  It sells wine directly from barrels for takeaway, and the pub's self produced  bottles of wine.Great for an afternoon drink after the beach.
